text: Karius | Software Engineer | Redwood City, CA | ONSITE | Full-time Karius sequences all the DNA in a normal blood draw to tell a physician what a patient is infected with. This is a revolutionary technology that needs to be driven by a lot of great software. Karius is well-funded, receiving orders, and hiring backend, frontend, pipeline, and devops engineers. https://jobs.lever.co/kariusdx
